de.fzi.replica.app.client
Interface Client

All Superinterfaces:
Application
All Known Subinterfaces:
Node
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientEclipseImpl, ClientImpl
public interface Client
extends Application

This is the main interface for a client instance.
The methods of this interface make extensive use of listeners which is required by the asynchronous messaging concept client implementations rely on.

Version:
version 0.3, 22.07.2011
Author:
Jan Novacek novacek@fzi.de

Method Detail

connect

void connect()
             throws Client.ConnectException
Connect to the server specified in the configuration. If this client instance has not been started yet it will be started when calling this method.

Throws:
Client.ConnectException

disconnect

void disconnect()
Disconnect from the server.

addOWLOntology

void addOWLOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                    java.lang.String group,
                    Client.OnOntologyAddedListener listener)
                    throws Client.AddException
Add the specified ontology to the pool of shared ontologies in group. If group is null, then the ontology will belong to no group. If group does not exist yet, it will be created.

Parameters:
ontology -
group -
listener -
Throws:
Client.AddException

getOWLOntology

void getOWLOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyID ontologyID,
                    Client.OnOntologyReceivedListener listener)
                    throws Client.FetchException
Fetches the ontology with the specified OWLOntologyID.

Parameters:
ontologyID -
listener -
Throws:
Client.FetchException

getOWLOntologyIDs

void getOWLOntologyIDs(java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> groups,
                       Client.OnOntologyIDsReceivedListener listener)
                       throws Client.FetchException
Returns IDs of all shared ontologies which belong to the specified groups.
If groups is null, IDs of all shared ontologies will be returned.
Beware that the specified set implementation has to be serializable.

Parameters:
groups -
listener -
Throws:
Client.FetchException

getGroups

void getGroups(Client.OnGroupsReceivedListener listener)
               throws Client.FetchException
Returns a list of all group names currently registered.

Parameters:
listener -
Throws:
Client.FetchException
